title: Compare price elasticities of 2 demand curves

content.description: The demand curves X and Y are shown in the graph above.
content.question: Which of the following offers the most accurate comparison of the price elasticities of demand curves X and Y at a price of $4?

choices.label:
Demand Curve X
 Demand Curve Y

Perfectly elastic
 Perfectly inelastic

Demand Curve X
 Demand Curve Y

Perfectly inelastic
 Perfectly elastic

Demand Curve X
 Demand Curve Y

Perfectly inelastic
 Relatively elastic

Demand Curve X
 Demand Curve Y

Relatively inelastic
 Perfectly elastic

Demand Curve X
 Demand Curve Y

Relatively elastic
 Relatively inelastic

content.answer:
Demand Curve X
 Demand Curve Y

Relatively inelastic
 Perfectly elastic

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe the similarities, differences, and limitations of economic concepts, principles, or models.
